item.name: Fish CRUD

exec: pm.test("Add fish POST request successful", function () {

request.description: User creates a new fish resource

request.description: User creates a new fish resource without all required attributes - fishCatch validation should fail

request.description: User reads a fish resource

request.description: User tries to read a fish resource of another user - unathorized action

request.description: User updates a fish resource.

exec: pm.test("Unautorized attempt to edit fish resource gets status 403", function () {

request.description: User tries to update another users fish resource.

exec: pm.test("Unauthorized delete request gets status 403", function () {

request.description: User tries to deletes another user's fish resource

exec: pm.test("Delete request gets status 200 OK", function () {

item.name: Fish Collections

exec: pm.test("User fish collection request has status 200 response", function () {

request.description: User requests to see all fish they have added

request.description: User requests to see all fish they have added sorted by species in descending order

exec: pm.test("Error in sort order query param gets 400 response", function () {

request.description: Requests to see user-fish resource with query param fault - sort order not recognised

request.description: User requests to see another user's user-fish collection resource

exec: pm.test("Fish request gets status 200 response", function () {

request.description: Request to get collection of (all) fish

exec: pm.test("sorted + ordered Fish request has status 200 response", function () {

request.description: Request to get collection of (all) fish sorted and ordered

exec: pm.test("fish request with query sort type error gets status 400", function () {

exec: pm.test("fish request with query sort order error gets status 400", function () {

item.name: Webhooks

request.description: register webhook to get notified when fishCatches are added to FishCatch API

exec: pm.test("duplicate webhook request should get status 400 response", function () {

request.description: duplicate webhook should not be accepted by API

exec: pm.test("unathorized attemt to add webhook should get status 401 response", function () {

request.description: Unathenticated attempt to register webhook in FishCatch API should fail with 401 response

exec: pm.test("Correct webhook get request should get status 200 response", function () {

request.description: Get registered webhook from FishCatch API

exec: pm.test("Unauthorized webhook request should get status 403 response", function () {

request.description: Unauthorized user tries to get registered webhook from FishCatch API

exec: pm.test("Unauthorized webhook delete request should get status 403 response", function () {

request.description: Unauthorized attempt to delete registered webhook from FishCatch API

exec: pm.test("Correct webhook delete request should get status 200 response", function () {

request.description: Delete registered webhook from FishCatch API

exec: pm.test("Delete request for Non existent webhook should get status 404 response", function () {

request.description: Delete request for non existent webhook from FishCatch API
